in all honesty I blame the crash for the nes' stability issues. nintendo had to coerce toy stores to carry them by calling it an "entertainment system" because they wouldn't touch anything called a "video game" 
the spring loaded bit on the inside was there to make the system seem like a vcr but in the long run messes with the pin connectors
it's butts I tells ya.
